016    package org.kuali.kfs.module.external.kc.service.impl;
017    
018    import java.net.MalformedURLException;
019    import java.util.ArrayList;
020    import java.util.Collection;
021    import java.util.Iterator;
022    import java.util.List;
023    import java.util.Map;
024    
025    import javax.xml.ws.WebServiceException;
026    
027    import org.kuali.kfs.integration.cg.dto.HashMapElement;
028    import org.kuali.kfs.module.external.kc.KcConstants;
029    import org.kuali.kfs.module.external.kc.service.ExternalizableBusinessObjectService;
030    import org.kuali.kfs.module.external.kc.service.KfsService;
031    import org.kuali.kfs.module.external.kc.util.GlobalVariablesExtractHelper;
032    import org.kuali.kfs.module.external.kc.webService.InstitutionalBudgetCategoryService;
033    import org.kuali.kfs.module.external.kc.webService.InstitutionalBudgetCategorySoapService;
034    import org.kuali.rice.kns.bo.ExternalizableBusinessObject;
035    
036    public class BudgetCategoryServiceImpl implements ExternalizableBusinessObjectService {
037        protected static org.apache.log4j.Logger LOG = org.apache.log4j.Logger.getLogger(BudgetCategoryServiceImpl.class);
038    
039        protected InstitutionalBudgetCategoryService getWebService() {
040            InstitutionalBudgetCategorySoapService ss = null;
041            try {
042                ss = new InstitutionalBudgetCategorySoapService();
043            }
044            catch (MalformedURLException ex) {
045                LOG.error("Could not intialize BudgetCategorySoapService: " + ex.getMessage());
046                throw new RuntimeException("Could not intialize BudgetCategorySoapService: " + ex.getMessage());
047            }
048            InstitutionalBudgetCategoryService port = ss.getBudgetCategoryServicePort();  
049            return port;
050        }
051    
052        public ExternalizableBusinessObject findByPrimaryKey(Map primaryKeys) {
053            Collection budgetCategoryDTOs = findMatching(primaryKeys);
054            if(budgetCategoryDTOs != null && budgetCategoryDTOs.iterator().hasNext())
055                return (ExternalizableBusinessObject) budgetCategoryDTOs.iterator().next();
056            else
057                return null;
058        }
059    
060        public Collection findMatching(Map fieldValues) {
061            List<HashMapElement> hashMapList = new ArrayList<HashMapElement>();
062            List budgetCategoryDTOs = new ArrayList();
063            
064            for (Iterator i = fieldValues.entrySet().iterator(); i.hasNext();) {
065                Map.Entry e = (Map.Entry) i.next();
066    
067                String key = (String) e.getKey();
068                String val = (String) e.getValue();
069    
070                if ( KcConstants.BudgetCategory.KC_ALLOWABLE_CRITERIA_PARAMETERS.contains(key)  && (val.length() > 0)) {
071                    HashMapElement hashMapElement = new HashMapElement();
072                    hashMapElement.setKey(key);
073                    hashMapElement.setValue(val); 
074                    hashMapList.add(hashMapElement);
075                }
076            }
077            if (hashMapList.size() == 0) hashMapList = null;
078       
079            try {
080                budgetCategoryDTOs = this.getWebService().lookupBudgetCategories(hashMapList);     
081            } catch (WebServiceException ex) {
082                GlobalVariablesExtractHelper.insertError(KcConstants.WEBSERVICE_UNREACHABLE, KfsService.getWebServiceServerName());
083            }
084            return budgetCategoryDTOs;
085        }
086        
087     }
